data.title: Apple’s latest Tesla hire specializes in car interiors
data.text: Another high-level Tesla engineering executive has hopped over to Apple. Steve MacManus, who was vice president of engineering at Tesla, is now a senior director at Apple, according to an update on his LinkedIn profile.

data.title: Apple's Heir Apparent Is Much Like Current CEO Tim Cook
data.text: Jeff Williams co-created the Apple Watch and runs the company’s global operations. Now he's the heir apparent if CEO Tim Cook were to leave. Bloomberg's Mark Gurman reports on "Bloomberg Markets."

data.title: Morgan Stanley's bullish call on Apple ahead of earnings defies conventional wisdom, Jim Cramer says
data.text: Morgan Stanley made a bold call on Apple. But CNBC's Jim Cramer says it would be a mistake to buy shares ahead of its earnings next week.

data.text: Apple may have wrote a check and signed a deal with Qualcomm in order to ensure a 5G iPhone wasn’t late to market, but it’s clear the Cupertino hardware giant wasn’t interested in burying the hatchet too deep. data.title: Apple in advanced talks to buy Intel's smartphone-modem chip business: WSJ
data.text: Apple Inc  is in advanced talks to buy chipmaker Intel Corp's  smartphone-modem chip business, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.

data.title: Apple Stock Gets Upbeat Assessment Ahead Of Quarterly Earnings
data.text:
Investment bank Morgan Stanley on Monday reiterated its buy recommendation on Apple stock and raised its price target ahead of the company's June-quarter earnings report next week.

data.title: Apple fixes Watch bug that let someone eavesdrop on your conversation
data.text: Apple reactivated the Apple Watch Walkie-Talkie feature, 12 days after it was turned off for security reasons.

data.title: Apple fixes Walkie Talkie app vulnerability in watchOS update
data.text: If you are, for some reason, an avid Walkie Talkie user on the Apple Watch, you will be pleased to learn that the functionality is back in the latest watchOS update today. The watchOS 5.3 release notes specify that the update “[p]rovides important security updates including a fix for the Walkie-Talkie app.

data.title: Apple stock gains after Morgan Stanley hikes target ahead of earnings
data.text: Apple Inc. shares AAPL, +1.31% are up 0.7% in Monday morning trading after Morgan Stanley's Katy Huberty raised her price target on the stock to $247 from $231, writing that the company has a "low risk" of missing expectations with its September outlook.

data.title: Goldman Sachs: The market is stuck, so buy these companies that can grow earnings instead
data.text: For investors hoping rate cuts would push the market higher, Goldman Sachs said stocks can't really go anywhere from here.

data.title: Morgan Stanley on Apple: 'Attractive setup into earnings'
data.text: Morgan Stanley maintained its overweight rating on Apple's stock and hiked its price target to $247 from $231, heading into the tech giant's third-quarter earnings on July 30.

data.title: Wedbush's Ives: Expect strong earnings from the FAANG names this week
data.text: Dan Ives of Wedbush Securities discusses whether Netflix's results were an outlier among the big tech names, and what to expect from Facebook, Amazon and Alphabet this week.
